entry.title: Active Tote 45L in Navy Blue
entry.summary:
Vendor: Away Travel
Type: Bags
Price: 140.00

Made from a lightweight, high-strength polyester, this versatile 45L Tote packs a day's worth of travel essentials. A top cinch closure adjusts to how much you pack, while an exterior and interior pocket system organizes your phone, passport, and other valuables within reach.

Made from 100% water repellent and abrasion-resistant Dual Action fabric, our Active Collection is designed to protect your belongings from the elements—whether you’re staying local or going off the grid.

entry.title: Active Convertible Backpack 25L in Navy Blue
entry.summary:
Vendor: Away Travel
Type: Bags
Price: 180.00

Made from a lightweight, high-strength polyester, this 25L Convertible Backpack holds a day trip's worth of essentials, whether for a hike or a quick road trip. Loaded with thoughtful design features inside and out, this versatile backpack has dual interior and exterior compression systems that help you pack more in and multiple pockets systems that securely stash valuables and keep them within reach. Made to work for short-distance travel, convert the removable padded straps into a backpack or duffle anytime, and stay hydrated with an exterior water bottle pocket that fits up to a 32 oz water bottle.

Made from 100% water repellent and abrasion-resistant Dual Action fabric, our Active Collection is designed to protect your belongings from the elements—whether you’re staying local or going off the grid.

entry.title: Active Hanging Toiletry Bag in Navy Blue
entry.summary:
Vendor: Away Travel
Type: Accessories
Price: 65.00

Designed for life in motion, the Active Hanging Toiletry Bag keeps your essentials organized wherever you go. Lightweight, durable, and made from 100% recycled materials, it's built to handle everything from weekend getaways to extended adventures. With a smart, trifold design, multiple storage compartments, and a strap that doubles as a wraparound and hanging hook, it's the ultimate companion for seamless travel.

Made from 100% water repellent and abrasion-resistant Dual Action fabric, our Active Collection is designed to protect your belongings from the elements—whether you’re staying local or going off the grid.

entry.title: Active Daypack 20L in Meadow Mauve
entry.summary:
Vendor: Away Travel
Type: Bags
Price: 100.00

From gym to work to weekend escapes, the Active Daypack 20L is made to move you through it all. Designed for smaller builds, this pack is lightweight, weather-resistant, and made from 100% recycled materials. With a 15" laptop pocket, smart storage, and a breathable, comfort-first design, this pack is ready for wherever you're headed next.

Made from 100% water repellent and abrasion-resistant Dual Action fabric, our Active Collection is designed to protect your belongings from the elements—whether you’re staying local or going off the grid.

entry.title: Active Rolling Duffle 85L in Navy Blue
entry.summary:
Vendor: Away Travel
Type: Luggage
Price: 395.00

Expand your horizons with our newest adventure-friendly addition to the Active Collection. The Active Rolling Duffle 85L is designed with our signature polycarbonate backing for serious durability, paired with a new soft front made from our water repellent Dual Action fabric that provides flexibility while packing.

Our interior organization and compression means you can pack everything you need. The proprietary Flipfold Frame allows for an easier packing experience and collapses completely flat when your duffle is ready to be stored while multiple interior pockets keep your smaller essentials organized.

Made from a lightweight 100% water repellent and abrasion-resistant recycled polyester, this duffle is designed to keep your belongings safe and dry.

entry.title: Carry-On Boot Bag 55L in Navy Blue
entry.summary:
Vendor: Away Travel
Type: Bags
Price: 250.00

The Boot Pack is your all-in-one solution for ski and snowboarding trips—designed to take you from packing to peak with ease. From Aspen to the Alps, this pack comfortably fits your ski boots, goggles, and helmet, plus 1–2 days’ worth of clothes. Thoughtfully designed for both the mountain and beyond, it’s built to handle any adventure.

With a main compartment that includes a removable boot cube, a roll-top section for your helmet, and a wipeable, weather-ready interior, it’s as durable as it is practical. Additional pockets for gloves, beanies, and small essentials keep you organized while padded, load-lifting, and adjustable shoulder, chest, and waist straps ensure an extra comfortable carry. Use the exterior compression straps to pack more in or the hidden daisy chains to attach extra gear.

Plus, keep things carry-on compliant by emptying and rolling down the helmet compartment, ensuring a smooth trip from check-in to chairlift.

entry.title: Active Backpack 26L in Jet Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Away Travel
Type: Bags
Price: 130.00

Made from a lightweight, high-strength polyester, this versatile backpack is loaded with design features that holds a day's worth of travel essentials, whether you're on an afternoon hike in a national park or exploring the outskirts of a new city. There are also two exterior water bottle pockets for keeping hydration on-hand, while a thoughtful organization system securely stashes all your essentials inside the bag.

Made from 100% water repellent and abrasion-resistant Dual Action fabric, our Active Collection is designed to protect your belongings from the elements—whether you’re staying local or going off the grid.

entry.title: Active Convertible Backpack 45L in Forest Green
entry.summary:
Vendor: Away Travel
Type: Bags
Price: 220.00

Made from a lightweight, high-strength polyester, this 45L Convertible Backpack holds a carry-on suitcase worth of essentials for up to a five-day excursion, whether for a riverside stay in the Poconos or a getaway to Joshua Tree. Loaded with thoughtful design features inside and out, this versatile backpack has dual interior and exterior compression systems that help you pack more in and multiple pockets systems that securely stash valuables and keep them within reach. Made to work for long-distance travel, convert the removable padded straps into a backpack or duffle anytime, and use the chest strap when in backpack mode for a more supported carry.

Made from 100% water repellent and abrasion-resistant Dual Action fabric, our Active Collection is designed to protect your belongings from the elements—whether you’re staying local or going off the grid.

The 40L travel duffle is the most compact duffle in the Active collection and packs for up to a four-night excursion, whether you're headed to a weekend cabin getaway or an overnight road trip. Made from a lightweight, high-strength polyester, this bag includes a shoulder strap that allows you to conveniently transport the duffle crossbody for longer distances.

Made from 100% water repellent and abrasion-resistant Dual Action fabric, our Active Collection is designed to protect your belongings from the elements—whether you’re staying local or going off the grid.

The 55L travel duffle is the medium-sized bag in the Active collection that holds a week's worth of gear. Made from a lightweight, high-strength polyester, this bag features our unique compression system that helps you pack more in and convertible padded straps that allow you to conveniently transport the duffle like a backpack for longer distances.

Made from 100% water repellent and abrasion-resistant Dual Action fabric, our Active Collection is designed to protect your belongings from the elements—whether you’re staying local or going off the grid.
